about_the_game:
ABOUT


Ghost Party is an open world, turn-based RPG inspired by Dungeons & Dragons and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney. Explore, fight, gather evidence and solve mysteries in a fantasy realm of ghosts & magic. Choose how you Interact with the world & its inhabitants. Fight or logically reason your way out of a battle. The choice is yours.


Mackenzie has been mysteriously and quite suddenly transported from Earth to a fantasy realm of ghosts & magic. In order to get back home, they must participate in the Ghost Games to earn one wish from the ghosts.

The Ghost Games is a competition held by the ghosts in order to determine the location of the next Ghost Party. In a Ghost Party, the ghosts will chaotically party in a realm, destroying everything in their path while leveling the realm to dust. A Ghost Party ends when the ghosts release all of their energy and go into hibernation until the next Ghost Games.

There are 4 realms in total: Summer, Spring, Winter and Fall Realm. Each realm has a participant representing it in the Ghost Games and a realm will become the host of the next Ghost Party if their participant loses. The winner will receive one wish from the ghosts.

Mackenzie must follow the Ghost Games participants and convince them to use their wish to send Mackenzie home by helping them collect Ghost Crystals to win the game. Through combat, exploration and intellectual reasoning, Mackenzie must secure every crystal they can get before their competitors.



FEATURES


  • Explore four vast realms
  • Engage in turn-based battles
  • Collect evidence and solve mysteries
  • Level-up your party with ability scores and skill trees
  • Take advantage of realm resources to craft, mine, garden, cook, and more!
  • Possess objects & nature to interact with the world through your ghost companion

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
